name: Spin The Barrel
description: There's two things that teens love the most: kissing and danger. What happens when six weird teens play a game that's a terrible merging of the two. Love? Death? Kiss?  Will you take your chances with these cruel rolls of the dice for the sake of a smooch? Find out who has the cold lips and who has the hot fingers in the dark comedy dating-sim-meets-russian-roulette.
